Procedure.name: setupCCC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CCC receiversSetup=CCC initialize=CCC setSection=0,*,730.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,730.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupXXP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=XXP receiversSetup=XXP initialize=XXP setSection=0,*,730.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,730.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupCCCL
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CCC receiversSetup=CCC receiversMode=NARROWBANDWIDTH initialize=CCCL setSection=0,*,300.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,300.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff
